price: Wͻnim Onyankopͻn adom no nanso wͻpo; wͻn mu dodoͻ no yε boniayԑfoᴐ.
arabic: يَعۡرِفُونَ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنكِرُونَهَا وَأَكۡثَرُهُمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yaʿrifūna niʿ'mata al-lahi thumma yunkirūnahā wa-aktharuhumu al-kāfirūna
